items.sentence: Tom has changed a lot since the last time I saw him.
Tom has contributed a lot of money to this hospital.
Tom and Mary have decided to get married in October.
Tom and Mary have decided to get married next month.
Tom and Mary have only been married for a few years.
Tom and Mary lost their jobs due to budget cutbacks.
I\'m going to call Tom tomorrow and ask him to help.
I\'m not as enthusiastic about doing that as Tom is.
I\'m not at all satisfied with the way Tom did that.
I assure you we\'ll be able to pay the rent on time.
No matter what you may say, I won\'t change my mind.
It\'s been a long time since we last saw each other.
I thought you didn\'t want to talk about this stuff.
Tom adores Mary and follows her everywhere she goes.
Tom advised Mary not to believe everything she read.
Tom and I used to go fishing every weekend together.
Tom and Mary are sitting in the living room talking.
Tom and Mary were screaming at each other in French.
I\'ve been wanting to tell you this for a long time.
I\'ve decided to stay in Boston for a few more days.
